trans-unit.source: Enter your home and work address for more efficient trip planning
trans-unit.target: Inserisci il tuo indirizzo di casa e di lavoro per una pianificazione più efficiente del viaggio
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Enter your home and work address for more efficient trip planning"; ObjectID = "41N-Fp-lIr";

trans-unit.target: Ultimo passo: Impostare il tuo stile di viaggio preferito!
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Last step: Set up your preferred travel style!"; ObjectID = "AM7-Fc-NDT";

trans-unit.source: TripGo helps you optimise daily trips
trans-unit.target: TripGo ti aiuta ad ottimizzare i viaggi giornalieri
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "TripGo helps you optimise daily trips"; ObjectID = "Tdu-LJ-B02";

trans-unit.source: Pick a supported city to continue
trans-unit.target: Scegliere una città supportata per continuare
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Pick a supported city to continue"; ObjectID = "a2d-Mj-Am0";

trans-unit.source: TripGo will display results according to your preferences
trans-unit.target: TripGo mostrerà i risultati secondo le tue preferenze
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "TripGo will display results according to your personal preferences"; ObjectID = "aMf-bu-Gcg";

trans-unit.source: Personalise TripGo so you'll get the most relevant results for your trips
trans-unit.target: Personalizza TripGo in modo da ottenere i risultati più rilevanti per i tuoi viaggi
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Personalise TripGo so you'll get the most relevant results for your trips"; ObjectID = "awR-6l-D62";

trans-unit.source: Congratulations on being a smart traveller!
trans-unit.target: Congratulazioni per essere un viaggiatore intelligente!
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Congratulations on being a smart traveller!"; ObjectID = "uyh-ZB-4id";

trans-unit.source: Sorry, TripGo is yet to work in your home city.
trans-unit.target: Spiacenti, TripGo non funziona ancora nella tua città.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Sorry, TripGo is yet to work in your home city."; ObjectID = "zS6-hR-gj9";

trans-unit.source: 1. Select your trip 2. Choose ticket and set up payment method 3. Scan QR code to use ticket 4. Your tickets are found in My Bookings
trans-unit.target: 1. Seleziona il tuo viaggio 2. Scegli il biglietto e imposta il metodo di pagamento 3. Scatta il codice QR per utilizzare il ticket 4. I tuoi biglietti si trovano in My Bookings
trans-unit.note:
Class = "UILabel"; text = " 1. Select your trip
 2. Choose ticket and set up payment method
 3. Scan QR code to use ticket
 4. Your tickets are found in My Bookings"; ObjectID = "hdH-hg-i0a";

trans-unit.source: Book Föli tickets right in TripGo
trans-unit.target: Prenota Föli biglietti direttamente in TripGo
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Book Föli tickets right in TripGo"; ObjectID = "igW-xa-f6A";
Minutes format (used for transfer times). (old key: Minutes)
Minutes format (used alert firing X minuts before departure). (old key: MinutesBefore)
Title for linked third-party account, eg, Uber Account
Filler for a specific service running at a time, e.g., '396 at 11:56am'
Filler for a specific frequency-based service indicating its frequency, e.g., 'M10 every 10 minutes'
Airline flight number with %airline and %flightNumber, eg, Qantas flight QF1 (old key: AirlineFlightNumber)
About for a provider, usually takes users to view a web page, eg, About PayiQ

trans-unit.target: Accesso ai servizi di localizzazione richiesti.

Error text to show when trying to use a feature which requires an account, but the user hasn't set one up (yet).
Action title for adding a vehicle

Confirmation that something got added HUD notice
Alert title that indicates an address is missing when creating a new event
Title for agenda screen while its still in setup mode
Action button title to see alternative options for the case where you cant make the next connection
Title for section to assign a trip to a vehicle
Filler for a service running at time, e.g., 'At 11:56am'
Header for settings of reminders automatically added by TripGo through the agenda
Number of available car parking spaces.
Response to positive answer to question whether TripGo is useful, prompting for App Store rating

trans-unit.id: Bookings made with TripGo will appear here.
trans-unit.source: Bookings made with TripGo will appear here.
trans-unit.target: Le prenotazioni effettuate con TripGo apparirà qui.

trans-unit.note: Informing users that they may be viewing cached bookings

trans-unit.target: Peccato... Che ne dite di un feedback?

trans-unit.id: Convenience is affected by things such as changing public transport services, the amount of walking, and finding a taxi.
trans-unit.source: Convenience is affected by things such as changing public transport services, the amount of walking, and finding a taxi.
trans-unit.target: La convenienza è influenzata da quante volte devi cambiare i mezzi pubblici, da quanto devi camminare, dalla difficoltà di trovare un taxi, ecc.

trans-unit.note: Error title when TripGo couldnt identify the users current city
Title for button that allows users to create a user account

trans-unit.target: Il tuo viaggio non è fattibile
Il viaggio personalizzato è stato annullato

trans-unit.note: Title for screen showing data providers
Text for attributing data sources. The list of providers will be used instead of '%@'
Title for transport modes that the user doesnt want included

trans-unit.id: Do you want to always use this trip and add it to your favourites?

trans-unit.target: Vuoi sempre utilizzare questo viaggio e aggiungerlo ai tuoi preferiti?

trans-unit.id: Don't have a fixed place of work or study? Skip this step.
trans-unit.source: Don't have a fixed place of work or study? Skip this step.
trans-unit.target: Non hai un posto regolare di lavoro o di studio? Salta questo passaggio.

Used in countdown context, indicating when a ticket becomes valid

trans-unit.note: Filler for a frequency-based service indicating its frequency, e.g., 'Every 10 minutes'
Title for list of expired tickets
Used in countdown context, indicating when a ticket expires
Placeholder text for search bar that is used for filtering
Header for list of vehicles garaged at this location
Title of settings for generic transport stuff
Header for settings for feedback, recommending and rating TripGo
Action button title for getting turn-by-turn directions
Description for button to get on or off at the selected public transport stop rather than where TripGo suggested
Typical name that you'd give your home location

trans-unit.id: In order to make bookings, you either need to log into your device with an Apple ID or you need to create a TripGo Account.
trans-unit.source: In order to make bookings, you either need to log into your device with an Apple ID or you need to create a TripGo Account.
trans-unit.target: Per effettuare prenotazioni, è necessario accedere al tuo dispositivo con un ID Apple o devi creare un account TripGo.
trans-unit.note: Instruction text to show when user is trying to make a booking, but he/she needs to create an account first.
Title for a switch indicating two things: 1) if transport mode should be included in trips and 2) if this event should be included in all-day routes
Accessibility hint for tapping title in agenda - jumps to today
Button title to switch view to list mode
Error title when favourite is missing a location

trans-unit.id: Long press on the map to choose a location
trans-unit.source: Long press on the map to choose a location
trans-unit.target: Tieni premuto sulla mappa per scegliere una posizione

trans-unit.note: Header for settings of reminders that the user manually added

trans-unit.id: Marking a location as a favourite will allow quick access to routing results for going there from your current location.
trans-unit.source: Marking a location as a favourite will allow quick access to routing results for going there from your current location.
trans-unit.target: Aggiungere un luogo come preferito ti permetterà di ottenere risultati veloci per raggiungerlo dalla tua posizione corrente.

trans-unit.id: Marking a transit stop as a favourite will allow quick access to its timetable.
trans-unit.source: Marking a transit stop as a favourite will allow quick access to its timetable.
trans-unit.target: Aggiungere una sosta nei preferiti ti permetterà di ottenere un rapido accesso agli orari.

trans-unit.id: Minimise results for this mode on the routes screen. Great for transport options you only use occasionally.
trans-unit.source: Minimise results for this mode on the routes screen. Great for transport options you only use occasionally.
trans-unit.target: Riduci i risultati di questa modalità sulla schermata percorsi. Ottimo per le opzioni di trasporto utilizzate solo occasionalmente.

trans-unit.note: Header for list of how to get more information (eg, by opening a website)
Title for profile item that loads a list of user's bookings
Header for list of my vehicles

trans-unit.id: Navigate to a supported city on a map.
trans-unit.source: Navigate to a supported city on a map.
trans-unit.target: Navigare in una città supportata su una mappa.
trans-unit.note: Error recovery suggestion for when TripGo couldnt identify the users current city

trans-unit.target: Non e stato selezionato il punto di partenza
Non e stato selezionato il punto di arrivo

trans-unit.note: Text to show on screen that lists bookings if user hasn't made a booking yet.
Error title for when no calendar found
Error title when routing produced no results (but no specific error was returned from routing).
Negative answer to follow-up question for rating or feedback
Negative answer to question whether TripGo is useful
Title for homescreen action to open the agenda

trans-unit.id: Open TripGo app and add the location of this favourite.
trans-unit.source: Open TripGo app and add the location of this favourite.
trans-unit.target: Apri TripGo app e aggiunge la posizione di questo preferito.
trans-unit.note: Error recovery suggestion for favourites with missing location

trans-unit.id: Open TripGo or Settings app on your phone and grant TripGo access to location services.
trans-unit.source: Open TripGo or Settings app on your phone and grant TripGo access to location services.
trans-unit.target: Apri l'applicazione TripGo o Impostazioni sul tuo telefono e concedi a TripGo l'accesso ai servizi di localizzazione.
trans-unit.note: Error recovery suggestion for when watch doesnt have access to location services

trans-unit.id: Permission was granted. Please go back and try again.
trans-unit.source: Permission was granted. Please go back and try again.
trans-unit.target: È stato concesso il permesso. Torna indietro e prova di nuovo.
trans-unit.note: Text displayed when the user has given the app access to private data such as their calendar or contacts, but the user needs to perform the original action again to now see the results
Title for homescreen action to plan a new trip
Title for button that allows users to plan a new trip

trans-unit.id: Plan a trip on your phone or press firmly to access your favourites.
trans-unit.source: Plan a trip on your phone or press firmly to access your favourites.
trans-unit.target: Pianificare un viaggio sul tuo telefono o premere con forza per accedere ai tuoi preferiti.
trans-unit.note: Instruction to users when there are no upcoming trips

trans-unit.id: Please adjust your query and try again.
trans-unit.source: Please adjust your query and try again.
trans-unit.target: Modifica la tua query e riprova.
trans-unit.note: Error recovery suggestion for when routing produced no results (but no specific error was returned from routing).

trans-unit.id: Please be advised that you are viewing cached copies of your bookings
trans-unit.source: Please be advised that you are viewing cached copies of your bookings
trans-unit.target: Si prega di notare che stai visualizzando le copie memorizzate nella cache delle tue prenotazioni

trans-unit.id: Please check your Calendar app and make sure you have a calendar configured.
trans-unit.source: Please check your Calendar app and make sure you have a calendar configured.
trans-unit.target: Controlla l'app Calendario e assicurati di avere un calendario configurato.
trans-unit.note: Error recovery suggestion for when no calendar found
Alert message that asks users to provide the missing address for a new event
Label for Overall button to sort trips by their overall total score considering all factors (old key: ViewOverallButton)
Title for preferred public transport modes
Label for Price button to sort trips by their total cost (old key: ViewPriceButton)

trans-unit.id: Regular events which will be saved in your device's calendar.
trans-unit.source: Regular events which will be saved in your device's calendar.
trans-unit.target: Eventi regolari che verranno salvati nel calendario del tuo dispositivo.
trans-unit.note: Explanation for what calendar events are compared to habituals and stays Can be long-ish
Confirmation that something got removed HUD notice

trans-unit.id: Removing this trip will exclude the following event from your agenda.
trans-unit.source: Removing this trip will exclude the following event from your agenda.
trans-unit.target: La rimozione di questo viaggio escluderà il seguente evento dalla tua agenda.

trans-unit.note: Title for switch indicating if an event repeats or not
Title for when an event repeats
Title for action to perform by the user if an event is outside TripGos range The action will display a feedback form to request the region of that event
Title for button that allows users to request support
Action title to reset agenda content
Action title to reset tutorial progress
Title for selector of return time for a trip
Header for section to configure return trip
Title for options for routing to this location, options are: current location, <some previously selected location>
Title of routes screen, that shows all the results for getting from A to B

trans-unit.id: Routines are part of your daily movement, but they aren't events that you want in your calendar (e.g., work). They are important for the Agenda to get you to the right location at the right time.
trans-unit.source: Routines are part of your daily movement, but they aren't events that you want in your calendar (e.g., work). They are important for the Agenda to get you to the right location at the right time.
trans-unit.target: Le routine sono la maggior parte del vostro movimento quotidiano, ma non sono gli eventi che desideri nel tuo calendario (per esempio il lavoro). Sono importanti per l'agenda per portarti nel posto giusto al momento giusto.
trans-unit.note: Explanation for what routines are compared to calendar events and stays Can be long-ish (old key: HabitualEventDescription)

alt-trans.target: Le routine sono la maggior parte del vostro movimento quotidiano, ma non sono gli eventi che desideri nel tuo calendario (per esempio il lavoro). Sono importanti per l'agenda per portarti nel posto giusto al momento giusto

trans-unit.id: Routing from %@ to %@ is not yet supported
trans-unit.source: Routing from %@ to %@ is not yet supported
trans-unit.target: Percorso da %@ a %@ non ancora supportato.

Total car parking spaces, i.e., not just those that are available.

Indicating an action that leads users to pick their work locations

trans-unit.id: Location services are required to use this feature. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Location Services, make sure they are turned on and authorise this app.
trans-unit.source: Location services are required to use this feature. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Location Services, make sure they are turned on and authorise this app.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare questa funzione è necessario abilitare i servizi di localizzazione. Vai su Impostazioni> Privacy> servizi di localizzazione, assicurati che siano abilitati e autorizza questa app.

trans-unit.note: Indicating a payment is in progress
Title for view that shows the summary of a user's account information
Name to which receipt is sent Name used in Facebook Title for name of something (or someone)
Response to question whether user wants to report a problem when taking a screenshot. Also used in context of repetitions (especially recurring events).
Title for sign in view when user does not have an account
Button to open Settings app section for this app

trans-unit.id: Please try again or set your location manually.
trans-unit.source: Please try again or set your location manually.
trans-unit.target: Riprovare o impostare la tua posizione manualmente.
trans-unit.note: Error recovery suggestion when GPS fails.
Location picker 'no autocompletion results' text. Needs to match text on keyboard.
Title for section that asks users where payment receipt should be sent
Button title to report a problem
Retry action, e.g., in case something didn't load
Sort by overall score, like a ranking.
Placeholder text while waiting for server response when searching for a location.
Button that goes to the Setting's app
Instruction for signing out user account

trans-unit.id: Sign up cannot be completed without a valid password
trans-unit.source: Sign up cannot be completed without a valid password
trans-unit.target: L'iscrizione non può essere completata senza una password valida

trans-unit.note: Message that indicates the app is signing users into their user accounts
Message that indicates the app has successfully completed signing out Message that indicates the app is signing users out of their accounts
Tap to set location. (old key: SetLocation)

trans-unit.id: The app will now sign out
trans-unit.source: The app will now sign out
trans-unit.note: Message that indicates the app is about to sign users out of their user accounts
user location button - follow with heading
Message that shows app is updating trip after user finalised bookings
Message that informs users that some values are missing from the required fields in a booking form.
Every weekday in context of repetitions (especially recurring events)
Every weekend day in context of repetitions (especially recurring events)

trans-unit.id: Would you like to report a problem?
trans-unit.source: Would you like to report a problem?
trans-unit.note: Question asked when user is taking a screenshot

trans-unit.id: You need to agree to the booking terms and conditions.
trans-unit.source: You need to agree to the booking terms and conditions.
trans-unit.target: Devi accettare i termini e le condizioni di prenotazione.
trans-unit.note: Message that informs users that T&C must be agreed before booking can be made.

trans-unit.id: You need to agree to the insurance terms and conditions.
trans-unit.source: You need to agree to the insurance terms and conditions.
trans-unit.target: Devi accettare i termini e le condizioni di assicurazione.
trans-unit.note: Message that informs users that T&C for insurance must be agreed before booking can be made.

trans-unit.id: You previously denied this app access to your calendar. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Calendar and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.source: You previously denied this app access to your calendar. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Calendar and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: A questa applicazione è stato negato l'accesso al tuo calendario. Per favore, vai su Impostazioni > Privacy > Calendario e autorizza questa applicazione ad utilizzare questa funzione.

alt-trans.target: A questa applicazione è stato negato l'accesso al tuo calendario. Per favore, vai su Impostazioni> Privacy> Calendario e autorizza questa applicazione ad utilizzare questa funzione.

trans-unit.id: You previously denied this app access to your contacts. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Contacts and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.source: You previously denied this app access to your contacts. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Contacts and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: A questa applicazione è stato negato l'accesso ai tuoi contatti. Per favore, vai su Impostazioni > Privacy > Contatti e autorizza questa applicazione ad utilizzare questa funzione.

trans-unit.note: Indicator that an event is all-day
Estimated time of arrival; parameter is time, e.g., 'arrives 15:30'
Estimated time of departure; parameter is time, e.g., 'departs 15:30'
Credit card expiry date placeholder, mm/yy
Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is early, e.g., '1 min early. This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min'.

Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is early, e.g., '1 min early (1:10 pm service). This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min' and #2 is replaced with the original time, e.g., '1:10 pm').
Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is late, e.g., '1 min late. This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min'

Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is late, e.g., '1 min late (1:10 pm service). This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min' and #2 is replaced with the original time, e.g., '1:10 pm').
Indicator for how cycle-friendly a cycling route is. Placeholder will get replaced with '75%'.
Number of stops before you get off a vehicle, if there are 2 stops or more, e.g., '10 stops'. (old key: Stops)
For describing a time interval, e.g., '8:30 to 8:43' From %time1 to %time2. (old key: TimeFromToShortFormat)
Indicator for how wheelchair-friendly a wheeelchair route is. Placeholder will get replaced with '75%'.
Number of stops before you get off a stop, if there's just 1 stop.
Prefix for selected 'arrive by' time Single line instruction to arrive
'%@' will be replaced with the arrival time. (old key: ArrivalTime)
The first '%@' will be replaced with the place of arrival, the second with the time. (old key: ArrivalLocationTime)
Title for when you'll arrive when on a trip. Countdown to arrival will be displayed below.
'At %location' indicator for parts of a trip that happen at a single location, e.g., waiting at a platform, parking at a car park. (old key: PrimaryLocationStationary)
Action title for calling provider of name. (old key: CallTaxiFormat)

trans-unit.id: Connect to Internet to get trips
trans-unit.source: Connect to Internet to get trips
trans-unit.target: Connettiti a Internet per fare viaggi
trans-unit.note: Single line instruction if device is offline and user needs to reconnect to internet to calculate trips

trans-unit.target: Impossibile trovare la fermata di transito.
trans-unit.note: Error title when server could not find a given transit stop.
To disconnect/unlink from a service provider, e.g., Uber
As in 'this bus/train has few seats available'
As in 'this bus/train is full and likely can't accept further passengers'
Action button title for getting turn-by-turn directions
First '%@' will be replaced with destination location, second with arrival at that location. (old key: MessageArrivalTime)
Indication of an activity. (old key: ActivityIndication)

trans-unit.id: In the meantime, let's keep exploring %@ and enjoy your trips
trans-unit.source: In the meantime, let's keep exploring %@ and enjoy your trips
trans-unit.target: Nel frattempo, continuiamo a esplorare %@ e godetevi i tuoi viaggi

trans-unit.id: In the meantime, let's keep exploring and enjoy your trips
trans-unit.source: In the meantime, let's keep exploring and enjoy your trips
trans-unit.target: Nel frattempo, continuiamo a esplorare e godetevi i tuoi viaggi

trans-unit.note: Prefix for selected 'leave after' time Single line instruction to leave
The place of departure. (old key: LeaveLocation)
The place of departure with time. (old key: LeaveLocationTime)
Title for when to depart. Countdown to departure will be displayed below.
As in 'this bus/train is so full, there's only limited standing room'
Title to show while loading/waiting for results
As in 'this bus/train has many seats available'
Title of button to get more details about an alert
Indicating no trips have been planned within the next 24 hrs
As in 'this bus/train is full and definitely not accepting further passengers'
Indicator to show when a service is on time according to real-time data.

trans-unit.id: Plan a trip and it will show up here.
trans-unit.source: Plan a trip and it will show up here.
trans-unit.target: Pianificare un viaggio e verrà visualizzato qui.

trans-unit.id: Search for this stop again or try again later..
trans-unit.source: Search for this stop again or try again later..
trans-unit.target: Search for this stop again or try again later.
trans-unit.note: Error recovery suggestion for when when server could not find a given transit stop.
Set up to connect/link to a service provider, e.g., Uber
As in 'this bus/train is fairly full and has standing room only'
Destination location. For trip titles, e.g., 'To work'. (old key: PrimaryLocationEnd)

trans-unit.id: We are busy getting your upcoming trip. Please wait...
trans-unit.source: We are busy getting your upcoming trip. Please wait...
trans-unit.target: Siamo impegnati ad ottenere il tuo prossimo viaggio. Attendere prego...

trans-unit.id: We'll keep you updated with the latest transit alerts here
trans-unit.source: We'll keep you updated with the latest transit alerts here
trans-unit.target: Vi terremo aggiornati con gli ultimi avvisi di transito qui

trans-unit.note: Time of the bus departure. (old key: DepartureTime)
Text indiction for how long a segment might take, where '%@' will be replaced with a duration. E.g., the instruction 'Take bus' might have this next to it as 'for 10 minutes'.
